This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
Hi <@U06ST64A282> a private beta just launched "AI chatbot", you'll need to request it from the product updates section

Hi, I'm using HubSpot to collect some information for my company and I'm having some problems. How do I make sure the HubSpot form is inserted into the specified location? Do you have relevant api documentation? Access method: <script> import, use hbspt.forms.create() function to create a form, thank you
